config: We had our Justia International Super Trivia Challenge. In this Jeopardy-themed trivia game, two teams faced each other by taking turns choosing a category and answering questions to accumulate points. Each matchup consisted of five categories with four questions in each category. Congratulations to The Magnificent 7, the absolute winners! Thank you all for participating.

contentOrder.title: Hackathon
config: Our Justia Hackathon 2021 has come to an end. We are happy to see the results and congratulate the top three Hackathon winners. As you recall, our engineering team was allowed to pick and work on their projects for a whole day. Congratulations, and thank you for bringing something new to the entire team.
